about.title: Why Knowia?
about.description1: Knowia is a learning app designed to make learning simpler, more lasting, and sustainable.
about.description2: Knowia is an evolving product. It is shaped by user feedback and aims to offer a stronger, more flexible, and more personalized learning experience over time.
about.description3: With its card-based structure and repetition-focused approach, Knowia breaks knowledge into small, manageable pieces. Users can create decks tailored to their needs or start learning with pre-made decks. They can produce content solely for themselves or enrich their learning by sharing content or using decks shared by other users.
about.description4: Knowia personalizes learning by adapting repetition intervals and learning flow according to each user's preferences. This allows every user to manage their learning process in a way that fits their own schedule, goals, and needs.
about.description5: With its clean interface and smooth interactions, Knowia helps users progress without distractions. Over time, learning stops feeling like a pressured task and becomes a regular, achievable habit.
about.description6: Knowia is a product that continues to evolve. Shaped by user feedback, it aims to provide an increasingly powerful, flexible, and personalized learning experience over time.
